events.description: Join us as we celebrate the union of John and Sarah in a beautiful wedding ceremony and reception. It's a day filled with love, joy, and unforgettable moments.

events.location: City View Rooftop Lounge, Los Angeles
events.description: Come celebrate Alex's 30th birthday with us at a stylish rooftop lounge in the heart of Los Angeles. Expect great music, delicious food, and lots of fun!
Join us in celebrating the upcoming arrival of Jessica's bundle of joy. It's a day filled with games, gifts, and sweet treats.
